name: dictionary_synonyms_temporarily_unavailable
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool webit_language.
Tool description: A.I. Text Paraphrase (Rewrite), Dictionary (Lookup, Examples, Bilingual, Synonyms, Antonyms), Key Phrases, Sentences Breaker.
API description: Fetches synonyms from a dictionary API for a given word in the specified language.

language.description: The language for which the synonyms are to be fetched.

q.description: The word for which synonyms are being requested.
